about_the_game:
Flawless Dream is a roguelike in which you must explore a pre-existing dungeon created by the gods to discover treasures, fight creatures, find the goddess' rewards and collect mana crystals.


To pass this challenges, you have the option to make a pact with the devil to increase the power that accompanies you. However, there is something special about this deal. Not only does the demon need you to gain power, but if you give him enough of what he wants, he will add some of his warm memories to your memory.

By taking the tests of the gods, collecting lots of mana crystals, and buying your hot memories from the devil, you'll be able to sleep easy now, experiencing hot moments you never imagined!





  • Explore unique dungeon created by the gods.
  • Increase your power by overcoming difficult challenges.
  • Make deals with the devil to not only gain power, but also to add warm memories to your memory.
  • Collect mana crystals to progress and earn rewards.
  • Sleep soundly as you experience unimaginably special moments.
Flawless Dream offers a roguelike experience that delivers both action and emotional depth. Pass the test of the gods and dive into an unforgettable dream!

short_description: A young man doomed to insomnia finally closes his eyes, but when he opens them again he finds himself in an astral world. The demon standing in front of him bargins to solve his sleep problem by sharing good memories. The devil is starving for mana crystals and he asks this young man to help him.
